title: List of all Androidbuild   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidbuild   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: cardslib
repoList.description: Android Library to build a UI Card

repoList.name: android-design-library
repoList.description: Build a Material Design App with the Android Design Support Library

repoList.name: android-components
repoList.description: A collection of Android libraries to build browsers or browser-like applications.

repoList.name: SwipeBackLayout
repoList.description: An Android library that help you to build app with swipe back gesture.

repoList.name: TextLayoutBuilder
repoList.description: An Android library that allows you to build text layouts more easily.

repoList.name: asmack
repoList.description: A build environment for the XMPP client library Smack on Android

repoList.name: AppCompat-Extension-Library
repoList.description: A library that builds on the AppCompat Design Library and provides additional common components such as AccountHeaderView, FloatingActionMenu, CircleImageView, Picker Dialogs, FlexibleToolbarLayout, Delightful Detail Drawables and TypefaceCompat.

repoList.name: EmailIntentBuilder
repoList.description: An Android Library for the creation of SendTo Intents with mailto: URI

repoList.name: FormBuilder
repoList.description: An Android library to build form and form validations easily.

repoList.name: instantsearch-android
repoList.description: A library of widgets and helpers to build instant-search applications on Android.
